properties.areaDesc: Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook; Northern Piscataquis
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 6:06AM EST until January 27 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of 2 to 5 inches with the highest totals in the western Saint
John Valley and along and near the western Maine and Quebec
border. Sleet accumulations of up to one half of an inch, and
ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch expected.

* WHERE...Northwest Aroostook, Northern Somerset and Northern
Piscataquis Counties.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight EST Sunday night.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or
freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery
roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to
newengland511.org.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT EST SUNDAY NIGHT
